created.title: The time this entity was created

updated.title: The time this entity was last updated

title.title: The title of the Ad ("headline" in DashHound API)

imageAdUrl.title: the url of the image used for the ad

clicks.title: The number of clicks for the ad

clickThroughRate.title: Click through rate percentage as a proportion between 0 and 1

platform.title: The platform this ad is running on (e.g. "Display & Remarketing", "Location")

timestamp.title: The time when the Form was submitted

v1LocalAdsTargetedLocationsStats.title: Represents metrics used for a single row in the "Location Targeted" sub-section of the Locations table
